7.heading: Wolfman, Marv, 1946-
7.title: Angel Sanctuary. v. 1
7.author: story and art by Kaori Yuki ; English adaptation by Marv Wolfman ; translator, JN Productions.
notes: Shôjo ed.
(Viz Graphic Novel)
"This book reads from right to left."
First published in Japan in 1995 by Hakusensha, Inc.
"Rated T+ for older teens."

Summary: "Why is Setsuna so mixed up? Despite his attempts to be noble, he'll fight anyone anytime; he ignores all authority; and he harbors feelings for his sister that can only be describes as "incestuous." Why is he such a mess? The reason may be found with two demons from the underworld and their enemy, an insane angel who is distributing an insidious computer game called Angel Sanctuary."

22.heading: Wolfman, Marv, 1946-
22.title: DC Comics' The New Teen Titans : in cooperation with the President's Drug Awareness Campaign
22.author: Marv Wolfman, writer ; Ross Andru, penciller ; Joe Giella, inker.
notes: Letter from Nancy Reagan on the inside cover.

There were three comics featuring the New Teen Titans as part of anti-drug education. The first had a white cover background, the second (this one) a dark blue cover background and the third an orange cover background.
Educational comic about drug abuse.
